name: ltsubrpd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))

comment: Subtracting a positive real from another number decreases it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
